title: Bistro style salad
ingredients: ['4 to 6 rashers smoked bacon, trimmed and cut into long strips', '1/2 teaspoon oil', '4 free range eggs', '1 large bag of mixed salad leaves or pre-packed crunchy salad', '1 handful of cherry tomatoes, halved', '1/2 cucumber, diced', 'Caesar dressing to serve']
